DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy vemurafenib combination cobimetinib ( GDC-0973 ) , compare vemurafenib placebo , previously untreated BRAF V600 mutation-positive patient unresectable locally advanced metastatic melanoma , measure progression-free survival ( PFS ) , assess study site investigator .
